short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps API users to catch what is wrong when they call APIs from their web app.  You won't waste time on investigations anymore.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By installing this extension you won't need to jump to chrome console log, then network tab and then to the IDE and API documentation just to find out what is the problem with your API call failures and what would be the proper solution for it.

Just add the API documentation in the settings tab of the extension and keep an eye on the extension icon. if API calls to the server in the API document fails, the badge appears on the icon and by clicking on it you'll find what's wrong and what's the possible solution.

Update version: 1.1.0

Support for all types of query parameters added. Except for object type.
Not resolving domains issue resolved by changes in permission.
